ul.li: Link to 04-20-2020 BOE Zoom meeting Password is GACSBOARD

br.h3: GACS Student Personal Items/Supplies/Chromebook Pick-Up Schedule

br.p: All student personal items, reserved Chromebooks, and needed learning materials have been bagged and marked with the student’s name on the bag. Please follow this schedule to assist our schools in controlling the flow of traffic and keeping everyone safe. Parents are encouraged to create a sign for your car window listing student name and grade.

br.h3: Elementary: Gilbert Elementary AND K.I. Sawyer Elementary

ul.li: K.I. Sawyer Elementary: Pull up to curb at bus canopy entrance, stay in car
Gilbert Elementary: From Iron Street, enter bus drive in back of school, stay in car

li.b: Elementary pick up is by grade; all bags are picked up at the time scheduled for the youngest or only child in the family.

ul.li: 12:00 p.m. to 1:00 p.m. ECSE, DK, Kindergarten

br.br:
Secondary: Gwinn Middle AND High School Pull up to curb at main canopy entrance as directed, stay in car.
Secondary pick up is by last name; all bags for the students in the family may be picked up by the last name of any child in the family.
Tuesday, April 21st
11:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. Last Name A – B
1:00 p.m. to 3:00 p.m. Last name C – G
3:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. Last Name H – L
Wednesday, April 22nd
11:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. Last Name M – O
1:00 p.m. to 3:00 p.m. Last name P – S
3:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. Last Name T – Z
Gym locker items pick-up is at the outside locker room doors on the gym side of the building, same date and schedule as above. Student/parent will be allowed to enter, one family at a time, to get items.

*The following list of websites and resources are provided to all. These sites are not connected to any requirements. These have been listed here for ease of access
Amazing Educational Resources
Gwinn Students are eligible for NMU WiMax affilate pricing (~about $20/month)
Free Charter Internet access for student program
Notice - The Gwinn Teen Clinic is still open for limited services by appointment only. We are also offering virtual or phone visits to our established patients to continue counseling services. No walk-ins are available at this time. To schedule an appointment, call the clinic at (906) 372-4002.

img.alt: School Budget and Salary/Compensation Transparancy Reporting link

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
